instructions: Tap Me, then turn on Share My Location. The device sharing your location appears below My Location. If your iPhone isn t currently sharing your location, tap Use This iPhone as My Location.
Tap Me, then tap Edit Location Name. Select a label. To add a new label, tap Add Custom Label, enter a name, then tap Done.

Scroll to the bottom of the People list, then tap Share My Location. In the To field, type the name of a friend you want to share your location with (or tap the Add Contact button and select a contact). Tap Send and choose how long you want to share your location.
